metadata.title: CVE-2024-23792 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: When adding attachments to ticket comments, another user can addattachments as well impersonating the orginal user. The attack requires alogged-in other user to know the UUID. While the legitimate user completesthe comment, the malicious user can add more files to the comment. Thisissue affects OTRS: from 7.0.X through 7.0.48, from 8.0.X through 8.0.37,from 2023.X through 2023.1.1.

criterions.comment: otrs2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
